text: ijiptil ninn avane (yusuphine) vilakketutta al tanre bharyayeat parannu: ivann man'yamaya tamasasekaryam nalkuka. avan namukk prayeajanappettekkam. allenkil namukkavane makanayi svikarikkam. aprakaram yusuphin nam a bhupradesatt sekaryamuntakkikeatuttu. svapnavarttakalute vyakhyanattil ninn addehattin nam ariyicc keatukkan ventiyum kutiyanatâ€Œ. allahu tanre karyam jayiccatakkunnavanatre. pakse manusyaril adhikaperum at manas'silakkunnilla
